text: @joncoopertweets I'm going to think of that graph with the MAGA riding the US trajectory when I see people out tomorrow saying "Fuck those ❄s, I'm tired of being inside" not thinking of our heroes on the front lines fighting #COVID19 alongside the diseases of arrogance, indifference & stupidity
